text: Yaad karo ke jab Ibrahim ko uske Rubb ne chandh baaton mein aazmaya aur woh un sab mein poora utar gaya, to usne kaha : “main tujhey sab logon ka peshwa banane wala hoon” Ibrahim ne arz kiya: “ aur kya meri aulad se bhi yahi waada hai?” Usne jawab diya: “mera waada zalimon se mutaaliq nahin hai.”
